text: René Varas (born 19 May 1936) is a Chilean equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Equestrians at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: René Varas
